snippet: President Obama, returning to full-throttle campaign mode after a week upended by the East Coast storm, accused Mitt Romney on Friday of dishonesty in saying that the auto bailout had resulted in jobs moving to China.
abstract: President Obama, returning to full-throttle campaign mode after a week upended by the East Coast storm, accused Mitt Romney on Friday of dishonesty in saying that the auto bailout had resulted in jobs moving to China.

headline.main: Obama Says Romney Is Being Dishonest About Auto Bailout
headline.print_headline: Back to Campaign, Blustery Obama Hits Romney on Auto Bailout Ad
